text: Vano Smbati Siradeghyan (; November 13, 1946 – October 15, 2021) was an Armenian politician, political commentator and writer. Between 1992 and 1996 he was Minister of Internal Affairs and Mayor of Yerevan from 1996 to 1998. After President Levon Ter-Petrosyan's resignation in February 1998, criminal charges were filed against Siradeghyan. Siradeghyan disappeared in April 2000 was wanted by Interpol since then. Siradeghyan died on October 15, 2021 at the age of 74.Скончался Вано Сирадегян ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mayors Category:Armenian politicians Category:Armenian writers Category:Political commentators Category:American criminals Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Vano Siradeghyan
